Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.io.IOUtils
  • public final class IOUtils
extends Object
    Provides tools for working with I/O operations.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray​(InputStream inputStream)
                          throws IOException
        Reads data from an input stream and closes the stream at the end of the operation.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input stream to read from (cannot be null).
        Returns:
        bytes stored by the input stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file, content or encoding is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly​(Closeable closeable)
        Closes a Closeable unconditionally.
        Parameters:
        closeable - the object to close (can be null or already closed).
        Since:
        2.0.0
